sourcesContent:
import { BsDash, BsPlus } from "react-icons/bs" import currecyFormatter from "currency-formatter" import React , {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import {useDispatch , useSelector} from "react-redux" const Details = () => { const [quantity , setQuantity] = useState(1); const {id} = useParams(); const dispatch = useDispatch(); const {product} = useSelector(state => state.ProductsReducer); // console.log(product); useEffect(() => { dispatch({type: 'PRODUCT' , id}) } , [id]) return (
{product.name}
{currecyFormatter.format(product.price, { code: 'USD' })} {currecyFormatter.format(product.dicount, { code: 'USD' })}
{quantity}

Details

{product.desc}
) } export default Details
